title: The Iron Gate
description: Iron Gate: An American soldier takes over an empty house in Baghdad and encounters the one threat he is powerless against.
itunes:title: The Iron Gate
itunes:subtitle: When Dallas Sanchez was stationed in Iraq, he saw danger every single day. Â But one night on patrol, when his small kill team took over a house in Baghdad, an unseen force had a message for them: Get. Out. Producer: Anna Sussman Original Score: Leon Mori
author: stats@snapjudgment.org (Snap Judgment)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and WNYC Studios
